description.displayText: We hired sky in July 2019. She assists with my mother and father and enables them to continue living in their home. Sky is our night care provider and we have called upon her with many changes in medication and or care.  She has always been extremely flexible and attentive to mom and dad's needs.  As a family,  we have appreciated her professionalism and the manner in which she goes above and beyond. We go to bed every night knowing that mom and dad are in the best care that we could possibly provide for them.
description.originalText: We hired sky in July 2019. She assists with my mother and father and enables them to continue living in their home. Sky is our night care provider and we have called upon her with many changes in medication and or care.  She has always been extremely flexible and attentive to mom and dad's needs.  As a family,  we have appreciated her professionalism and the manner in which she goes above and beyond. We go to bed every night knowing that mom and dad are in the best care that we could possibly provide for them.

description.displayText: My Mom is in a memory care unit with Alzheimer's and we wanted her to get some private attention a few days a week. Sky visits my Mom as a companion several days a week, for 2-4 hours at a time. She sits with Mom at lunch, takes her out to the patio on nice days, and/or chats with her in her room or does some low-key activities with her such as reading to her or listening to music. Sky is a very kind, patient and gentle person and a great companion for an elderly person. My mother can be hard to understand as she often garbles her words, but Sky listens carefully and tries to follow the conversation and keep her engaged. She is always willing to follow my suggestions but also as she has gotten to know my Mom she takes the initiative to make suggestions herself; always with the idea of improving my mother's experience. My Mom can be irritable at times and Sky never takes it personally; she understands it is the disease. The staff at my Mom's facility also speak very highly of her.

description.displayText: Sky provided companionship to my elderly mom who suffers with dementia/Alz. A sweet soul, Sky is patient, calm, and always goes the extra mile to make her visits special.
description.originalText: Sky provided companionship to my elderly mom who suffers with dementia/Alz. A sweet soul, Sky is patient, calm, and always goes the extra mile to make her visits special.

description.displayText: Sky is caring, dedicated, patient and friendly.  She's worked for me and I would not hesitate to call on her again - there aren't many trustworthy people out there but Sky's one of the best out there.
description.originalText: Sky is caring, dedicated, patient and friendly.  She's worked for me and I would not hesitate to call on her again - there aren't many trustworthy people out there but Sky's one of the best out there.

description.displayText: Sky provided care for my wife so I could work.  She is easy to work with and has an excellent way of dealing with my wife.  She is considerate of my wife's needs without sacrificing professionalism.
description.originalText: Sky provided care for my wife so I could work.  She is easy to work with and has an excellent way of dealing with my wife.  She is considerate of my wife's needs without sacrificing professionalism.

description.displayText: Sky helped take care of my mother during 2011-2012. She was very attentive and worked hard. Sky not only provided excellent care but also kept the environment of the house clean and safe. She provided good companionship for my mother and Sky's personality was very calm and comforting.
description.originalText: Sky helped take care of my mother during 2011-2012. She was very attentive and worked hard. Sky not only provided excellent care but also kept the environment of the house clean and safe. She provided good companionship for my mother and Sky's personality was very calm and comforting.

description.displayText: Sky is very knowledgeable and credentialed. But over and above that, is the loving way that she cares for my Mother. She has worked on her skin and scalp (which were both very dry) and her skin just glows. She does so much more than just giving a bath. She massages sore muscles and puts balm on aching knees and neck. She makes sure her lunch is well presented and keeps Mom company. I would highly recommend her. My Mother is very fond of her.
